alert.note: Alert for Green; Hart; Marion; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 5:58PM EST until February 17 at 6:30PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Green County in central Kentucky... South central Marion County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Hart County in central Kentucky... Central Taylor County in central Kentucky... * Until 630 PM EST/530 PM CST/. * At 558 PM EST/458 PM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Campbellsville to 6 miles south of Munfordville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Campbellsville around 610 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Greensburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
